description: BJP's performance in Andhra Pradesh-Telangana Lok Sabha elections highlights its evolution from equal strength in both regions pre-bifurcation to limited strength in Telangana post-2014, with key victories and alliances shaping its electoral success.
title: 4 decades on, BJP flounders in Telugu-speaking states

description: Saudi Arabia stresses dialogue between Islamabad and New Delhi for resolving outstanding issues, including Kashmir. Previous joint statements and current discussions highlight bilateral resolution of the J&K dispute for regional peace and stability.
title: Saudi prince urges Pak PM for India-Pak talks to resolve Kashmir issue
Yellen warns China banks over Ukraine

description: Skoda Volkswagen India advocates reserving 5% GST benefits for electric vehicles under four meters to avoid financial strain. Petr Janeba suggests targeting the masses for EV adoption and highlights the need to differentiate sub-four meters EVs for subsidies, emphasizing the company's investment and expansion plans.
title: Reserve 5% GST benefit for smaller EVs: Skoda

description: RBI governor Das calls for increased Indian bank participation in rupee derivatives markets, domestically and offshore, ensuring fair treatment for retail customers and transparency in pricing.
title: RBI governor Das asks banks to play bigger role in forex market

description: Gold prices rose by more than Rs 1,500 on Monday to a record Rs 71,100/10gm, breaking the Rs 70,000 mark for the first time, owing to increased geopolitical threats and active buying by central banks. Silver, too, joined the party, crossing the Rs 80,000/kg mark for the first time, with prices rising by Rs 2,000 to Rs 81,200/kg.
title: In a 1st, gold tops Rs 71,000, silver Rs 81,000

description: Tata Electronics to acquire majority stake in Pegatron India for iPhone manufacturing, boosting Apple ties. Investment in Tamil Nadu facility and Luxshare's China factory takeover are key developments in Apple's India strategy.
title: Tatas eye majority stake in Pegatron's India plant

description: India's market capitalisation surpassed Rs 400 lakh crore on Monday, adding slightly more than Rs 100 lakh crore in the last nine months, owing to a healthy local economy despite global uncertainties, good corporate earnings, and strong buying by institutional investors. India's market cap had crossed Rs 300 lakh crore in early July 2023.
title: BSE's m-cap crosses Rs 400 lakh crore

description: After granting permanent commissions to women short service commission officers in the Army, Navy, and Air Force, the Supreme Court on Monday decided to investigate similar career opportunities for women short service agreement (SSA) officers in the Indian Coast Guard, while also ordering the interim reinstatement of a woman officer who was discharged in December 2023 after a 14-year career.
title: 'March with time': SC on permanent stint for women in Coast Guard

description: Punjab and Haryana high court likened the assault on a Tarn Taran woman to Draupadi's cheerharan during the Mahabharat era, emphasizing the need for judicial intervention in the face of such incidents.
title: Tarn Taran assault reminds us of Draupadi cheerharan: HC

description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has asked ministries to submit a 100-day plan for the incoming government, and ministries are planning a number of "people-friendly" activities. The Indian Railways, for example, intends to implement a 24-hour refund program for passengers who cancel their tickets, which presently takes at least three days.
title: Interest subsidy on home loan for poor may be part of 100-day plan

description: TASL & Satellogic launched TSAT-1A, India's first private sub-metre res earth observation satellite. It offers high-res images to Indian armed forces, surpassing Isro's resolution. The satellite, in an inclined orbit, received support from Indian authorities for permissions.
title: Tata launches India’s 1st pvt sub-metre surveillance satellite

description: In a gesture symbolic of hope and resilience, a Ram temple in Sukma, closed for 21 years due to Maoist influence, has been reopened as temple bells rang in celebration. Located just 10km from the tragic 2010 Tadmetla massacre site and near Hidma's Tekulguda stronghold where 22 jawans lost their lives in April 2021, the Kerlapenda village temple stands as a beacon of peace amidst conflict.
title: Sukma’s Ram temple reopens 21 years after Maoists shut it down

description: Supreme Court, led by Justices B R Gavai and Sandeep Mehta, examines Karnataka's plea against Union govt for drought relief, urging internal resolution. Karnataka demands Rs 18,171 crore, citing memoranda and invoking fundamental rights under Article 32.
title: Let there not be a contest between Union & state: SC

description: Idukki diocese screens controversial movie 'The Kerala Story' for students, sparking discussions. Fr Jins Karakkat explains 'Love Jihad'. VD Satheeshan criticizes, while BJP president K Surendran supports, highlighting 'love jihad' victims in Kerala.
title: Church screens 'Kerala Story' to fight 'love jihad'

description: Supreme Court intervenes, halting Karnataka govt's Class 5, 8, 9, 11 SA-2 results. Despite school closure, results released. Legal opinion pending. Distress among stakeholders. HC orders on exams stayed.
title: SC stays declaration of K'taka school exam results, but order late

description: Thakurnagar's Matua hub in chaos as Mamata Bala faces eviction by Shantanu. Accusations of desecration and legal disputes over Boroma's room. Tensions escalate with central force involvement in the conflict.
title: Matua standoff: TMC MP Bala, Union minister trade charges

description: Fadnavis confirms MNS joining NDA after Thackeray's 2014 endorsement of Modi. Thackeray expected to announce support at Gudi Padwa rally. Alignment with Mahayuti, Hindutva, BJP noted. Concerns over North Indian sentiment and BJP leaders' worries.
title: Expect Raj Thackeray to declare support for Modi today: Fadnavis

description: Cuddalore candidate Bachan's visit to a temple's fortune-telling parrot resulted in a divine prediction of his Lok Sabha victory, accepted during his electoral campaign.
title: TN candidate seeks out fortune-telling parrot, leaves feeling happy

description: Transgender Mahamandaleshwar Hemangi Sakhi of Nirmohi Akhara will run against Prime Minister Narendra Modi in the Lok Sabha elections from Varanasi on the Akhil Bharat Hindu Mahasabha (ABHM) ticket. The Kinnar decided to run in the elections in order to bring the government and political parties' attention to transgender people's rights.
title: LS polls: Nirmohi Akhara’s transgender face to challenge PM Modi

description: Supreme Court invalidated money laundering case tied to Chhattisgarh liquor scam due to absence of predicate offence and crime proceeds. Enforcement Directorate's complaint lacked basis for invoking PMLA, leading to potential fresh charges.
title: SC junks case against Chhattisgarh ex-IAS officer, son

description: PM Modi launches BJP's election campaign, targeting Congress for corruption and divisive politics. He emphasizes direct fund transfer and accuses Congress of discussing Partition, threatening alliances, and criticizing Uddhav Thackeray for inviting controversial parties.
title: Congress' appeasement politics led to terrorism, Naxalism, says PM Modi

description: NEET-UG aspirants facing Aadhaar problems get a two-day window reopening from April 9, closing at 10.50pm. NTA emphasizes careful usage, no future application opportunities available.
title: Registration for NEET-UG now open till April 10

description: ICMR-NCDIR study in India reveals 30% aged 18-54 never had blood pressure checked. Southern India has high screening rates, including standout UT/states like Lakshadweep (91%), Kerala (89%), Tamil Nadu (83%). Lower rates in Madhya Pradesh (62.4%), Chhattisgarh (62%).
title: 30% of Indians aged 18-54 have never got BP measured: ICMR

description: Observing that not everyone who makes claims on social media may be imprisoned, the Supreme Court on Monday reinstated the bail of YouTuber 'Sattai' Durai Murugan, who was charged with uttering insulting remarks about Tamil Nadu Chief Minister M K Stalin in 2021. However, Murugan remained on bail as top court had stayed HC order which has now been set aside.
title: Not everyone making claims on social media can be jailed: SC

description: EC chose not to interfere in NIA's actions following the Bhupatinagar blast in Purba Medinipur, West Bengal. Allegations of malpractice were made by TMC against NIA, leading to the removal of protesting MPs by Delhi police.
title: Since NIA raid is not tied to polls, EC has little room to intervene

description: Delhi Police detained TMC MPs at Election Commission, seeking leadership changes in ED, CBI, NIA, and Income Tax for fair play. Unrest in East Midnapore over CBI notices. TMC alleges BJP's influence on NIA chief.
title: Rein in central outfits, TMC tells EC, but panel unlikely to step in

description: K Kavitha denied interim bail in Delhi excise policy case due to alleged money laundering and witness tampering. The court highlighted her active involvement, evidence destruction, and influence on witnesses. Saumya Chaurasia verdict was considered regarding her child's situation.
title: ‘Involved in laundering’: Court denies K Kavitha bail

description: CJI D Y Chandrachud pushes for timely judgments, gathering data on delayed verdicts from HCs. Some judges cause delays by scheduling fresh hearings, impacting litigants. Emphasis on efficiency in judgment delivery to reduce costs and judicial time wastage.
title: CJI seeks timely verdicts, judges opt to give up cases

description: PM Narendra Modi dismissed China's territorial claims on Arunachal Pradesh, declaring that the state "is an integral part of India and will always remain so." He also stated that the Centre's quick intervention, together with the Manipur government's efforts, resulted in a significant improvement in the situation in the state.
title: Arunachal was, is and will remain part of Bharat: PM Modi

description: Tourist taxi driver from New Delhi attacked by terrorists in J&K's Shopian district. Concerns arise over resurgence of violence targeting non-natives. Previous targets include police officers, migrants, and non-Kashmiri workers. 29 targeted killings reported in J&K in 2022.
title: Delhi cab driver wounded in J&K terrorist attack

description: A new assessment calls for the removal of colonial-era artworks from the foreign office's Whitehall offices, as well as the department's name, which it defines as "somewhat elitist and rooted in the past". "The very name of the Foreign, Commonwealth (formerly ‘Colonial’) and Development Office (FCDO) is anchored in the past,” the report states.
title: UK foreign office is ‘elitist and rooted in past’, report says

description: The noise level at the MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai skyrocketed to 125 decibels, as recorded by broadcasters, the moment Mahendra Singh Dhoni stepped onto the field against the Kolkata Knight Riders on Monday. Dhoni entered the crease when CSK needed just three runs off 19 balls, prompting an eruption of joy from the crowd.
title: Watch: Russell covers ears upon Dhoni's arrival

description: Ravindra Jadeja demonstrated his expertise on the challenging Chepauk pitch as the Chennai Super Kings reclaimed their winning form, convincingly defeating the Kolkata Knight Riders by seven wickets in Monday's IPL encounter. This triumph marked CSK's third victory in five games, all secured at Chepauk, following two consecutive losses on the road.
title: IPL: Jadeja, Gaikwad bring CSK back to winning ways

description: On Monday at the MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai, Chennai Super Kings skipper Ruturaj Gaikwad showcased strong leadership, guiding his team to a seven-wicket victory over Kolkata Knight Riders in the IPL 2024 match.
title: Gaikwad first CSK captain in five years to…

description: Elon Musk has said, “The natural progression is to provide Tesla electric vehicles in India.” Musk’s statement is being seen as a big sign of interest in Indian markets. Reports suggest that Tesla hopes to establish a state-of-the-art manufacturing plant in India with investments of $2-3 billion.
title: Did Musk just confirm Tesla’s entry into India’s EV market?
'This kind of politics is not democracy': Vadra on targeting of oppn leaders

description: TMC leaders detained during dharna outside ECI, demand transfer of agency chiefs for fair play. Allegations of NIA misuse by BJP. Mamata Banerjee accuses investigators of assault. BJP-NIA nexus claimed. TMC seeks EC intervention to preserve election sanctity.
title: Delhi police detain TMC leaders who held dharna outside Election Commission office
AAP vows to take 'jail ka jawab vote sey' to all corners of country

description: CSK star all-rounder Ravindra Jadeja on Monday joined the likes of Virat Kohli, Suresh Raina, Kieron Pollard and Rohit Sharma, completing 100 catches in the IPL. Jadeja also worked his magic with the ball, taking three wickets in a space of eight balls to rip the heart out of KKR's batting as CSK were left to chase a manageable target of 138.
title: 'I don't count': Jadeja's cheeky response after 100 IPL catches

description: Want to buy a refrigerator under 20000? Here is a list of some of the best picks that you can consider buying online for the needs of a small family.
title: Best refrigerators under 20000: Top Picks from best brands

description: Byju's, the edtech major, is facing financial challenges with delayed salaries due to conflicts with foreign investors. The management has arranged an alternative credit line for salary payouts.
title: March payouts begin as embattled Byju’s arranges for alternative credit
The interview: ‘It’s A Suresh Vs Modi fight, candidate is incidental’

description: A doctor at a private hospital in Jagraon played singer Sidhu Moosewala's song during a surgery on a three-and-a-half-year-old boy injured in a road accident. The child, Sukhdarshan Singh from Maliana village in Moga district, was injured when a car ran over his leg while playing. The doctor's choice of Punjabi song "Jatt Di Mashook Biba Russia Toon" in the operation theatre.
title: Docs play Moosewala song in op theatre to calm child patient

description: “India is currently experiencing a mini-Goldilocks moment,” MOFSL said. A Goldilocks moment is one where all situations are ideal. MOFSL is optimistic about India's medium-term prospects.
title: Mini-Goldilocks moment! Why Motilal Oswal thinks India is big, bold and blazing

description: Mumbai, the five-time IPL champions, recovered from their initial three defeats to clinch a 29-run victory against Delhi Capitals, marking their first win in the IPL 2024 season on Sunday.
title: 'He missed 100 runs...': Sehwag's big remark on Rohit

description: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi on Monday during a rally in Madhya Pradesh's Shahdol, criticised the BJP government's "Agnipath scheme," alleging that it puts Indian soldiers at a disadvantage against their Chinese counterparts. Gandhi claimed that recruits under the "Agniveer Yojana" undergo only six months of training, compared to Chinese soldiers who train for five years.
title: 'Agniveer won't last against Chinese soldier': Rahul

description: During a rally in Maharashtra's Chandrapur, Prime Minister Modi criticised the Shiv Sena and Congress for inviting individuals who belittled Sanatam Dharma by comparing it to diseases like dengue and malaria. Udhayanidhi Stalin, son of Tamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin, sparked controversy last year by saying that "Sanatana Dharma" should be eliminated.
title: PM Modi calls Uddhav's bloc 'nakli Shiv Sena'
Delhi HC verdict on Kejriwal's plea against arrest on Tuesday

description: During the IPL 2019 season, Australian cricket legend Shane Watson, a key member of the Chennai Super Kings squad, recounted a memorable incident involving the team's skipper at the time, Mahendra Singh Dhoni. The incident took place during a match against the Rajasthan Royals at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur.
title: When MS Dhoni lost his cool

description: Legendary Brian Lara asserted that Virat Kohli's value transcends cold numbers, and the West Indian virtuoso has little doubt that the star batter should be a part of India's T20 World Cup squad.
title: 'Virat Kohli's value beyond strike-rate'
BJP is going to be No. 1 party in Bengal: Prashant Kishor

description: The tragic Sharjah fire incident reported by Khaleej Times led to 5 deaths, including Indians, with 44 injured. Michael Sathyadass, a sound engineer at DXB Live, succumbed to injuries. Another victim was a recently married woman from Mumbai.
title: Two Indians lost their lives in UAE's Sharjah fire incident
Protesting TMC MPs detained outside EC office; seek removal of chiefs of central probe agencies

description: Airline policies on cancellation and refunds vary. It's crucial to know the rules of Air India, SpiceJet, Akasa Air, and Indigo, as charges differ based on fare classes and time of cancellation.
title: What are flight ticket cancellation charges? Check rules

description: Bigg Boss OTT Season 3 rumored to have notable contestants. Mandira Bedi debunks rumors. Elvish Yadav's victory in Season 2 amid controversies. Abhishek Malhan and Manisha Rani placed in the show's history. Shark Tank India 3 investor discusses losses.
title: Bigg Boss OTT season 3 to premiere next month on May 15?
Joint ownership of one flat won’t bar tax benefit on another: ITAT

description: Pegatron in talks to transfer iPhone plant in India to Tata, backed by Apple. Tata to hold 65% stake in Chennai joint venture. Deal reflects Apple's supply chain diversification strategy beyond China.
title: Tata Group may buy Pegatron's only India iPhone plant

description: When in full flow, the swashbuckling batsman Rohit Sharma possesses the capability to dismantle any bowling attack across the globe. Beyond his explosive batting prowess, which has often seen him dispatching even the most esteemed bowlers to the boundary ropes, Rohit harbors another talent off the cricket pitch – mimicry.
title: Watch: Rohit Sharma imitates Tendulkar, Dravid, Yuvraj

description: When reflecting on MS Dhoni and Gautam Gambhir, one of the standout memories is their extraordinary 109-run partnership in the 2011 World Cup final against Sri Lanka. Gambhir recently shared insights into his on-field rivalry with Dhoni during the IPL. As the former skipper of KKR, Gambhir, who led the team to two IPL titles, found himself in tactical battles against MS Dhoni, the five-time IPL-winning captain.
title: 'Dhoni is not that...': Gambhir on his rivalry with MSD

description: Justices Gavai, Mehta, Venkataramani, and Tushar Mehta heard Karnataka's plea on denied NDRF assistance. The delay post IMCT review until Dec 2023 was highlighted, involving Solicitor General, Election Commission, and Live Law.
title: 'Don't compete ... cooperate': SC on Centre, state funds row
LS polls: Congress, NC reach seat-sharing deal in J&K

description: During a rally in Bastar on Monday, Prime Minister Narendra Modi forcefully rebuked opposition parties, vowing that individuals engaged in corrupt activities will be subject to imprisonment, irrespective of any intimidation tactics they may employ. Modi's strong stance comes in the midst of ongoing accusations from opposition figures regarding the alleged misuse of investigative agencies against their members. Addressing the crowd, Modi took aim at the Congress party, drawing parallels between its manifesto for the Lok Sabha elections and that of the Muslim League.
title: 'They are angry': PM attacks INDIA bloc over Ram Mandir

description: Israeli military's AI operations in Gaza, criticized for civilian casualties, face scrutiny. The Lavender system's misidentification issues and minimal human oversight raise concerns. Brianna Rosen criticizes Israel's targeting criteria and Biden warns against indiscriminate bombing.
title: How Israel is using AI tools to hit Hamas militants

description: Enhance happiness by strengthening Venus through love potion bracelets. Improve relationships, boost confidence, and find joy and contentment with friends and family. Experience luck, peace, and increased fun and enjoyment in life by connecting with Venus's energy.
title: Making life better with Venus: Love, beauty, and harmony

description: Washing clothes can be very difficult if you don't have a functional washing machine. A washing machine helps you not just wash clothes, but also dry them and maintain their quality. In this article, we will let you know about some of the best 8 Kg washing machines that you can buy online.
title: Perfect washing machine for small to medium-sized family

description: Teju, also known as Teja, was brutally murdered in Bachupally. Videos of the incident were shared on social media. He had been involved in a previous murder case and relocated before the fatal attack.
title: Cyberabad: Killers post chilling murder details online

description: Congress leader Mallikarjun Kharge responded to PM Narendra Modi's statement linking their manifesto to the Muslim League. Kharge highlighted that Shyama Prasad Mukherjee, a BJP ideological figure, supported the British over Congress in the independence movement. He also remarked on PM Modi's speeches carrying traces of the RSS ideology. Kharge claimed that Mukherjee wrote to the English governor about how to "combat" the Quit India movement and "suppress" Congress.
title: Kharge slams PM Modi's 'Muslim League' jibe, Cong complains to EC

description: Congress leader Mallikarjun Kharge responded to PM Narendra Modi's statement linking their manifesto to the Muslim League. Kharge highlighted that Shyama Prasad Mukherjee, a BJP ideological figure, supported the British over Congress in the independence movement. He also remarked on PM Modi's speeches carrying traces of the RSS ideology. Kharge claimed that Mukherjee wrote to the English governor about how to "combat" the Quit India movement and "suppress" Congress.
title: Kharge slams PM Modi's 'Muslim League' jibe, Cong complains to EC

description: Southwest Airlines flight suffered an engine cover issue during takeoff, prompting a safe return to Denver. FAA investigates the incident. Passengers witnessed the scary event, leading to a full-speed landing. Safety remains the top priority for the airline.
title: More trouble for Boeing, plane's engine cover falls off in US

description: Small-cap and mid-cap mutual fund schemes have excelled as top performers in actively-managed equity funds over the past year, outperforming benchmarks and maintaining a lead in returns over a five-year period. Value-oriented funds focusing on public sector companies in sectors like banks, railways, and defence have also shown strong performance.
title: Small-cap and mid-cap funds among top performers

description: Union minister Smriti Irani claimed on Monday that Congress leader Rahul Gandhi, allegedly took assistance from the banned organisation Popular Front of India (PFI) to run for the Lok Sabha elections in Kerala's Wayanad, his present constituency. While addressing reporters, ​Irani accused the Congress MP of disparaging the residents of Amethi, a parliamentary constituency historically aligned with the Congress but now under her representation.
title: 'Rahul took help from terror outfit...': Union minister Smriti Irani
Nirupam alleges Sanjay Raut kingpin of Khichdi scam

description: From April 1, 2024, insurers must issue digital policies under IRDAI's new rule. Benefits include convenient policy management. Physical copies are available upon request. No guidelines for converting existing policies to digital format currently.
title: What is e-Insurance? Benefits for policyholders

description: Mumbai Indians secured victory against Delhi Capitals at Wankhede Stadium in IPL 2024. Rohit Sharma excelled with 49 runs, praised as senior statesman for focusing on team goals over individual performances. Rohit hit 3 sixes and 6 fours in his knock and sure enough his contribution was acknowledged in the MI dressing room after the match.
title: Watch: What Rohit Sharma said after MI win against DC

description: Passengers in Goa argue with taxi drivers over GoaMiles rides. Local taxis demand higher fares, leading to conflicts. Users face intimidation from non-affiliated drivers. Goa tackles transportation issues with GoaMiles, but faces resistance from some taxi drivers.
title: Cancel Rs 300 GoaMiles ride: Cab driver threatens tourists

description: Passengers in Goa argue with taxi drivers over GoaMiles rides. Local taxis demand higher fares, leading to conflicts. Users face intimidation from non-affiliated drivers. Goa tackles transportation issues with GoaMiles, but faces resistance from some taxi drivers.
title: Cancel Rs 300 GoaMiles ride: Cab driver threatens tourists

description: Lucknow Super Giants defeated Gujarat Titans in their IPL match on Sunday, extending their unbeaten run while defending totals of 160 or more to 13-0. Yash Thakur's five-wicket haul and Marcus Stoinis's all-round show were instrumental in the victory. LSG are now third on the points table with 3 wins in 4 matches.
title: KL Rahul for defence minister? LSG now 13-0 defending 160-plus

description: Mamata Banerjee challenges PM Modi's corruption crackdown pledge post Lok Sabha results, citing NIA incident in Bhupatinagar, questioning democracy and BJP leaders' imprisonment threat. She emphasizes a 2022 blast case dispute.
title: 'Modi ki guarantee' implies putting oppn behind bars: Mamata

description: Sharad Pawar criticizes PM Modi's power centralization, defends family in Maharashtra rally. Questions BJP alignment, emphasizes voters' power in Lok Sabha elections, supporting Supriya Sule against Sunetra Pawar.
title: This is not democracy, it is dictatorship: Sharad Pawar slams PM

description: Lucknow Super Giants triumphed with standout performances by Yash Thakur, Krunal Pandya, and Ravi Bishnoi. The team's fielding excellence, including Bishnoi's remarkable catch, underlines their strong position in IPL 2024. And with Jonty Rhodes as your fielding coach, LSG players are expected to come up with such outstanding efforts in the field in IPL 2024.
title: Watch: Jonty Rhodes decodes Bishnoi's 'flying catch' vs GT

description: Banks in multiple Indian states will close on April 9 for Gudi Padwa and Ugadi festivals, resulting in 14 total April holidays. Digital banking channels offer convenient transactions, and the RBI categorizes bank holidays into different types.
title: Banks open for only 3 days this week in some states

description: Jat community's pivotal role in UP politics is underscored by BJP's maneuvers to secure their support. RLD's strategic alignment with BJP aims to consolidate Hindu votes while risking alienating Muslim support, reshaping the state's political landscape.
title: Jat's the way: What makes them crucial to cracking west UP riddle

description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un asserts a stance of readiness without seeking war amidst escalating tensions with South Korea. Pyongyang's maritime border dispute and ties with Moscow for missiles raise concerns. Speculation on a potential North Korea-US nuclear conflict unveils grim scenarios and global repercussions, highlighting the dangers of such events.
title: What would happen in case of North Korea-US nuke war?

description: Mariyam Shiuna, Maldivian politician, issued an apology amidst a controversy surrounding a deleted social media post that was perceived as disrespectful towards the Indian National Flag. The post, now taken down, displayed a campaign poster from an opposition party, seemingly adorned with the Ashok Chakra commonly seen on the white central band of the Indian flag. Following widespread backlash and public outcry, Shiuna removed the post and subsequently issued an apology.
title: Maldives politician ‘disrespects’ Indian flag, apologises later

description: PM Modi emphasized the importance of shared responsibility in addressing the sensitive situation in Manipur and highlighted the notable improvement in the state's condition, attributing it to the timely interventions of the central government and the dedicated efforts of the state administration. Speaking with Assam Tribune, Prime Minister Modi underscored the commitment of the central government, stating that it has deployed its top resources and administrative mechanisms towards resolving the conflict in Manipur.
title: Timely intervention by Centre saved Manipur: PM Modi

description: In preparation for the Lok Sabha elections, the AAP has initiated a "Jail ka Jawab Vote Se" campaign to garner public backing for Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal, currently held in Tihar jail. AAP Rajya Sabha MP Sandeep Pathak said, "Kejriwal was arrested as part of a big conspiracy. We are launching the campaign 'Jail Ka Jawab Vote Se' and we want you to empower Kejriwal."
title: 'Jail ka jawab vote se': AAP launches Lok Sabha campaign

description: Delhi high court on Monday dismissed a plea seeking the removal of Arvind Kejriwal from his position as chief minister, stating that the petition was filed for "publicity" and the petitioner deserved to have "heavy costs" imposed on him. Justice Subramonium Prasad, while transferring the petition said that similar petitions had already been addressed earlier.​​
title: 'Publicity': HC on 3rd plea seeking removal of Kejriwal as CM

description: Boat customers' personal data, leaked by hacker ShopifyGUY, poses risks like financial scams and identity theft. Companies face legal consequences and loss of trust, emphasizing the importance of strong security practices.
title: Details of 7.5 million Boat customers leaked on Dark Web: Report

description: Elon Musk urges Brazilian justice Alexandre de Moraes to resign for stifling free speech by blocking accounts spreading disinformation. The controversy involves Moraes' actions against supporters of former president Jair Bolsonaro.
title: 'Betrayed…': Elon Musk calls for ouster of Brazil SC justice

description: At the Dearborn rally, sentiments against US and Israel funding emerged. Dearborn's history of protests, support for Hamas, Hezbollah, and concerns over extremism were highlighted. The rally sparked discussions among local leaders and condemnation for equating Israel with ISIS and Nazis.
title: Protesters in Michigan chant 'Death to America, Israel'

description: New Vs Old Tax Regime: Salaried taxpayers face a critical decision within 10 days on selecting their tax regime for the current financial year. The choice, a one-time decision, must be made at the start of the new financial year, affecting tax slabs and deductions.
title: How income of even Rs 10 lakh can be tax-free under old regime

description: Kerala gears up for a face-off as BJP's Rajeev Chandrasekhar challenges Shashi Tharoor for Thiruvananthapuram seat. Both leaders agree to debate on local issues before Lok Sabha elections. Senior Congress leader Tharoor accepts the challenge, emphasising on key issues like politics, development, and BJP's politics of hatred over the past decade.
title: Shashi Tharoor accepts rival Rajeev Chandrasekhar's challenge
Donald Trump's 'secret' plan to end Russia-Ukraine war
'Don't call me bhayya': Autowala's message goes viral

description: Kangana Ranaut, who transitioned from acting to politics, refuted rumors suggesting she consumes beef, affirming her commitment to a vegetarian lifestyle deeply tied to her identity as a devout Hindu. Her statement comes in response to online speculations triggered by an old tweet from 2019 discussing her yogic practices, which some interpreted as implying her past beef consumption. However, doubts were raised about the authenticity of the tweet, as it lacked clear first-person language and was open to interpretation.
title: 'I am a proud Hindu': Kangana Ranaut denies eating beef

description: Gold and silver prices reached all-time highs. Gold at Rs 71,080 per 10g, up by Rs 440 (0.62%). Silver at Rs 82,064, a rise of Rs 1,076 (1.33%). Rise linked to a drop in the dollar index.
title: Record highs: Gold hits Rs 71,000; silver surges

description: Apple tackles challenges in developing foldable screens without creases for iPads. Plans for a 20.3-inch foldable MacBook by 2027 align with rumors around a potential foldable iPhone. Release dates for Apple's foldable devices remain uncertain.
title: Foldable iPads: Apple may be working on them, but why your wait will be long

description: Bengaluru grapples with a water crisis and soaring temperatures, facing scrutiny and challenges. Twitter users express frustrations over the surprising temperature trend, while debates spark online about the contrast with Mumbai's weather and the impact on migrants seeking a better life.
title: Bengaluru vs Mumbai: Which city offers better weather? Heatwave sparks online debate

description: Against Rajasthan Royals, Virat Kohli scored a record-extending eighth IPL century, but his knock proved futile as RCB lost the match by six wickets. Consequently, Kohli's 72-ball 113 not out was criticized for being slow, as his century, which came in 67 balls, was the joint slowest in Indian Premier League history.
title: Virat's strike-rate questioned, Babar says it's a 'separate story'

description: Known as a death-over specialist, Yash Thakur plays for Vidarbha in domestic cricket and was picked up by Lucknow Super Giants for IPL 2023 a day after he grabbed his first 5-wicket haul in First Class cricket and was retained for the 2024 season. The pacer was rewarded for his white-ball performance in the Syed Mushtaq Ali T20 Trophy that caught the attention of many IPL franchises for the 2023 auction.
title: Yash Thakur: LSG pacer who took first five-wicket haul of IPL 2024

description: Adani Green Energy plans a massive investment of Rs 2 lakh crore by 2030 to increase renewable energy capacities to 45 GW. The expansion includes a major boost in Khavda, Gujarat, to 30 GW from 2GW, with additional investments for 6-7 GW beyond Khavda.
title: Adani Green likely to invest Rs 2 lakh crore in renewable energy

description: The teaser for "Pushpa 2: The Rule" has stirred a passionate response on social media, with netizens praising Allu Arjun's portrayal of Pushpa Raj for its intensity and power. Released on Allu Arjun's 42nd birthday, the 68-second teaser provides a tantalizing glimpse into the heightened stakes and fierce demeanor of Pushpa Raj in the sequel.
title: ‘Pushpa 2 The Rule’ teaser social media review

description: Crafting round rotis is an art form, but beginners face challenges. A viral video shows a woman making rotis in a pressure cooker quickly using a rolling board. She adds salt, ghee, and faces negative comments.
title: 'Hey Prabhu': No, she is not making rotis on a tawa

description: Bengaluru experiences scorching heat with rising temperatures. Netizens express frustration on Twitter as the city gets hotter than Delhi and Mumbai. Hope for rain to ease the heat and water crisis, with forecasts of 38 degrees Celsius and expected rains post Ugadi.
title: B'luru boils as mercury matches India’s hottest states

description: Indian stock market has hit a milestone with BSE's market cap crossing Rs 400 lakh crore for the first time. The surge, led by retail investors, reflects a Rs 100 lakh crore growth within 9 months. Nifty has soared over 16%, reaching 22,623.90.
title: Rs 100 lakh cr gain in 9 months: BSE market cap hits Rs 400 L cr

description: According to a report, the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA), a Southwest Airlines Boeing 737-800 bound for Houston had to return to Denver International Airport on Sunday. This was due to an incident where an engine cover detached and struck the wing flap of the aircraft. The FAA announced its intention to conduct an investigation into the incident. In recorded air traffic control communications, one of the pilots mentioned that "several passengers and flight attendants heard something loud hit the wing."
title: Boeing jet's engine cover falls off, strikes wing

description: Virat Kohli, the former RCB captain, is now into his 17th season with the team, still yearning for that coveted IPL victory. For 16 consecutive seasons, RCB have strived to win the Indian Premier League title, but despite boasting cricketing icons such as Chris Gayle & AB de Villiers in the past and Kohli among its ranks since 2008, the wait continues.
title: 'Damn!' - Watch Virat getting angry with a fielding effort
Delhi court dismisses interim bail plea of K Kavitha

description: Apple's ecosystem in India, having created 150,000 direct jobs, is now focusing on residential facilities for factory employees under a public-private partnership. Approximately 78,000 units will be constructed, with Tamil Nadu receiving the highest allocation. The project aims to enhance efficiency, security, and welfare outcomes for workers, especially migrant women employees.
title: Apple ecosystem to now build residential facilities for workers

description: Israel's military says it is fully prepared to respond to potential developments following a suspected Israeli attack on the Iranian embassy in Syria on April 1. Iran has promised retribution for the incident, though it remains uncertain if any response would be direct or executed via proxy groups like Hezbollah in Lebanon. An Iranian official ominously stated on Sunday that Israeli embassies are "no longer safe," signaling a heightened state of tension between the two nations.
title: War in Middle East: Is Israel ready for Iran's 'revenge' attack?

description: Solar eclipse in 2024 will have mixed effects on zodiac signs. Aries may face financial loss, while Capricorn could gain respect and prestige. Pisces may encounter self-confidence issues, urging project delays.
title: Solar Eclipse and its effects on all Zodiac signs

description: Drowsiness among LMV drivers leads to numerous accidents on the Yamuna Expressway. Urgent road safety policy reforms are required based on the data to address this issue and improve overall safety measures on the road.
title: Drowsy drivers caused 40% deaths on Yamuna Expressway

description: Despite being the wettest, Kolhapur's Panhalkarwadi faces water scarcity. Drying streams, high tanker prices, and government neglect worsen the situation. Residents, like Shamrao Patil, refuse to vote due to water scarcity impact.
title: Kolhapur’s wettest taluka fights water scarcity as early as April

description: Pawar criticizes Fadnavis for breaking parties. Fadnavis responds, calling Pawar a pioneer in splitting. Pawar emphasizes party workers' loyalty and intention to confront splitters. He defends Maharashtra's unity and condemns govt's misuse of power.
title: Sharad Pawar's dig at Devendra Fadnavis: 'He split parties and families'

description: Choosing a headphones that matches all your requirements and has splendid sound quality along with unmatched comfort is something that is not easy to find. This is why we are here to help you find something amazing. Take a look at some of the best headphones under 10,000 which are comfortable, have amazing sound quality and are great.
title: Best headphones under 10k for unmatched comfort and sound

description: Audi hits family near Jalmana village, killing one and injuring two. Sahab Singh's body found in pieces. Car with 'Ankit Ror' sticker impounded. Family seeks justice, wants culprits arrested.
title: Audi cuts man into 17 pieces in Karnal, maims woman & her child

description: Shown black flags, chased in vehicles
title: Shown black flags: BJP’s Patiala nominee faces farmers’ anger

description: During a podcast appearance, Pakistan captain Babar Azam was presented with a hypothetical scenario and asked which bowler he would rely on to bowl the crucial last over in a T20 match. Presented with two options, he promptly made his choice without hesitation. Babar has recently been reappointed as Pakistan's white -ball captain.
title: For Babar Azam, Bumrah is not likely to do better than Naseem in....

description: Google's animation commemorates the upcoming total solar eclipse, showcasing the moon's movement in front of the sun. Explore specific Google search terms to witness this celestial event and experience the phenomenon firsthand.
title: Total Solar Eclipse: Google celebrates with special animation

description: Delhi witnesses a 22% increase in drunk driving cases this year, with top areas like Rajouri Garden and Samaypur Badli. Road safety experts express concerns over the surge, emphasizing the need for stricter enforcement measures.
title: Delhi drunk driving cases record 22% rise from previous year

description: Unflattering hashtags trend when Virat Kohli scores but RCB or India lose. Despite his unbeaten 113 in Jaipur, RCB's loss sparked social media buzz. Kohli faced challenges with strike-rates and partnerships, raising questions about team dynamics and performance. Kohli's innings progression was incremental if you consider strike-rates. He scored 32 off his first 25 (SR, 128), got 39 off his next 25 (SR 156) and 42 off his last 22 (SR 191.9).
title: Was Virat Kohli's knock the reason why RCB lost to Rajasthan Royals?

description: Mexico's decision to reduce its crude exports is intensifying a worldwide oil supply constraint, affecting refineries in the United States, the globe's leading oil producer. This situation has led to an increased reliance on domestic oil supplies. The scenario is further aggravated by American sanctions that have left Russian oil cargoes stranded, with the potential for Venezuelan supplies to face similar challenges.
title: Israel-Iran tensions: Will oil prices hit $100 this summer?

description: Biocon Ltd., headquartered in Bengaluru, is shifting its focus towards anti-obesity therapies as patents for its blockbuster medications begin to expire. This move comes in response to the anticipated surge in generic supply for the market, projected to reach $100 billion by 2030. The company has scored an early win among its peers with the UK approval for the first generic version of liraglutide injectible.
title: Biocon leads India push into weight loss drugs as patents lapse

description: The fact that the Chepauk pitches have been conducive for stroke-making will light up the eyes of the KKR batters, who have smashed more sixes (45 in 3 matches) than fours (44) so far this campaign. The bowling unit, led by Australian firebrand Mitch ell Starc, could be a tough nut to crack if the visitors adapt to the nature of the surface quickly. As for CSK, there is no point crying over spilt milk.
title: Kolkata Knight Riders aim to ambush Chennai Super Kings at Chepauk

description: Hiba manages fasting and shoots during Ramadan, shares childhood memories of Roza, loves baingan ke pakode and khajla sweet, and discovered cooking talents during the lockdown, making aate ka halwa and halwa cake. Take a look at what Hiba had to share about her first roza and the celebration that her family prepared.
title: Jhanak's Hiba Nawab recalls memories of her first roza

description: The Delhi-Meerut Expressway grapples with nightly congestion as trucks line up near the toll plaza, affecting Delhi-bound commuters. No-entry rules for commercial vehicles in Delhi contribute to this issue, leading to persistent traffic problems.
title: Country's widest e-way a truck parking lot at night

description: Four individuals sustained injuries in a series of collisions involving twelve vehicles after a speeding container struck them in Nagpur's Mankapur area. The incident included nine cars, an ambulance, and two two-wheelers. An eyewitness reported the container descending from a flyover at high speed, triggering multiple collisions.
title: Speeding container rams 12 vehicles in Nagpur

description: Vadodara samosa shop owner and 5 others arrested for selling cow meat samosas. 'Hussaini Samosa' raided, cow meat confirmed in FSL tests. Accused include Yusuf Sheikh, Naeem Sheikh, Hanif Bhathiyara, Dilawar Pathan, Moin Habdal, and Mobin Sheikh.
title: Gujarat: Six arrested for selling samosas stuffed with beef

description: A man, identified as Shant Soghomonian, was arrested for starting a fire outside Sen. Bernie Sanders' office in Vermont. The incident involved the use of accelerant and a lighter, but no injuries occurred as sprinklers extinguished the blaze. Motive undisclosed, potential 20-year prison sentence if convicted.
title: Man arrested for setting fire outside US senator Bernie Sanders' office

description: BSNL collaborates with Nokia and ZTE to integrate 2G/3G networks with a C-DoT developed 4G network. Stabilizing outdoor 4G services, expanding IMS capacity, and piloting in select sites pave the way for a commercial rollout.
title: Why government-owned BSNL is dialling China's ZTE and Finland's Nokia

description: The 1952 general elections in India, led by PM Nehru, were a pivotal moment in the nation's history. Madras, now Chennai, showcased unique electoral methods, educating on adult franchise through media. Symbol-based voting, challenges in counting, and women's active role defined the election. The empowerment of common people marked a shift in power dynamics.
title: 1952: Of booths, Ballots and a sense of belonging

description: J S Sidharthan's suicide in Wayanad after public ragging, involved a 29-hour assault. Severe mental stress reported. CBI investigates; father to meet the team.
title: Kerala student assaulted for 29 hours before his suicide: Cops

description: Rrahul Sudhir shares his challenging journey due to a spinal issue, including bed rest, parental struggles, and his path to recovery. Through his experience, he raises awareness about spinal injuries and offers hope to others facing similar struggles.
title: Exclusive- Rrahul Sudhir opens up about his spinal injury

description: Boeing737-800 jet in Denver lost engine cowling during takeoff, striking wing flap. FAA investigates. No casualties. Southwest Flight 3695 returned safely. Alaska Airlines 737 MAX 9 faced door plug panel issue at Lubbock Airport.
title: Boeing jet loses engine cover, investigation underway

description: Comedians Kapil Sharma and Sunil Grover reunite post-feud, sharing a viral social media post. The Great Indian Kapil Show, featuring the duo along with other stars, premiered on March 30, 2024, airing fresh episodes at 8 p.m. every Saturday.
title: Sunil Grover drops a selfie with Kapil Sharma

description: Ukrainian volunteers in England, trained by Operation Interflex, are preparing to fight the Russian invasion of Ukraine. Over 32,000 individuals have been trained since June 2022, with multinational support. The focus is on regaining territory and enhancing combat skills. Despite losses, Ukrainian forces resist Russian advances with allied support.
title: How ordinary Ukrainians are getting battle-ready in UK’s training fields

description: Lady doctor accused DMO Prakash Chandra Bal of sexual harassment. Town police registered a case, currently under investigation. DMO denies allegations. Dolamani Naik leads the case investigation.
title: 'Surgeon used to call me to his chamber and touch me': Doctor

description: A cybercrook impersonating a CBI officer tricked a software engineer in Wakad, siphoning Rs 40 lakh. Inspector Salunkhe detailed the scam tactics. Victim filed a complaint, and investigations are ongoing. Public awareness on such scams is crucial.
title: Fake CBI officer siphons off Rs 40 lakh from techie
